definition: to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Rick asks Gaines to pay him for his completed job.
sentences.chinese: 里克向盖恩斯要求支付他的酬金，因为他完成了任务。

sentences.english: They invited those pop stars to the ceremony at vast expense.
sentences.chinese: 他们以高额酬金把那些歌星请到了这次的典礼上来。

sentences.english: He delivered lectures on the Hibbert foundation at Manchester College.
sentences.chinese: 他领取希伯特基金会提供的酬金在曼彻斯特学院讲课。

sentences.english: I overpaid him for his service.
sentences.chinese: 对他的服务，我多付了他一些酬金。

sentences.english: This is an honorarium given in consideration of her contributions to this project.
sentences.chinese: 这是为他在这项工程中做出的贡献而办法给她的酬金。

sentences.english: We can only offer you a beggarly two hundred pounds to start with.
sentences.chinese: 一开始我们只能给你区区二百英镑作为酬金。

sentences.english: To re - appoint auditors and to authorise the directors to fix their remuneration.
sentences.chinese: 续聘核数师及授权董事厘定其酬金。

sentences.english: I wanted to give him money after he helped me but he refused it.
sentences.chinese: 我很想给他点酬金来报答他的帮助，可他拒绝了。

sentences.english: Shee was to receive a hefty payout for her role in their final betrayal.
sentences.chinese: 事成之后，希会得到一大笔酬金。

sentences.english: I know you’re only interested in the reward money.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你对酬金感兴趣。

sentences.english: The players’agent is entitled to be remunerated for the service he provides.
sentences.chinese: 球员经纪人有权为其提供的服务获得酬金。

sentences.english: Both members and non-members are eligible for the honoraria .
sentences.chinese: 双方成员和非成员有资格获得的酬金。

sentences.english: A reward will be paid to anyone who brings back the money that he lost.
sentences.chinese: 凡能将他遗失的钱寻回者可得到酬金。

sentences.english: In exchange for a sizable fee, Jango would become the template of a clone army.
sentences.chinese: 詹戈将成为克隆人军队的模板，酬金相当可观。

sentences.english: Interests could include consultancies, honoraria , patent ownership or other.
sentences.chinese: 利益包括顾问，荣誉，酬金，专利所有权或其他。

definition: to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
